HelpDialog - Class in mckay.utilities.gui.templates
Dialog box that allows users to read help (or other) documents in HTML format.

Set up the dialog box and display the default help file.
horizontalAlignment - Variable in class mckay.utilities.gui.tables.MultiLineCellRenderer
 
HTMLFramesPanel - Class in mckay.utilities.gui.templates
A JPanel with one frame on the left and one on the right, each of which can display an HTML file.
